title: Data Scientist
summary: Work with cross-functional teams to build predictive models and deliver actionable insights.
description: The Data Scientist will collaborate with product and engineering teams to design experiments, build predictive models, and communicate findings to stakeholders.
responsibilities: Develop machine learning models for customer segmentation and churn prediction
Present insights to technical and non-technical audiences

title: Data Engineer
summary: Build scalable data pipelines and analytics infrastructure.
description: The Data Engineer will design, build, and maintain data pipelines to support analytics and machine learning workloads.
responsibilities: Implement batch and streaming data pipelines
Collaborate with analytics teams to improve data quality

title: Product Manager, Analytics
summary: Lead roadmap planning for analytics products and define success metrics.
description: Own the product vision for analytics tooling and partner with design, engineering, and marketing to launch impactful features.
responsibilities: Collaborate with engineering on feature delivery
Conduct user research and synthesize feedback
